solution.text:
Point c=(3,94), Point d=(4,47)
Therefore, the movie earned 94 crores and 47 crores in the third and fourth weeks respectively
Difference in earnings = 94-47
=47 crores
Hence, the greatest difference in earnings as compared to its previous week was in week 4.

content.text: In which week was there the greatest difference in earnings as compared to its previous week?
